template.question: What is VideoMint template?
template.answer: VideoMint is a production-ready AI video generation SaaS template built with Next.js 15, React 19, and Drizzle ORM. It includes everything you need to launch your own AI video platform: user authentication, credit system, AI provider integration, payment processing, and a beautiful UI ready for customization.

deployment.question: How do I deploy this template?
deployment.answer: VideoMint can be deployed to Vercel, Railway, or any Node.js hosting platform. Simply connect your GitHub repository, set up the required environment variables, and deploy. The template includes detailed documentation in the /docs folder to guide you through the process.

aiModels.question: Which AI models are supported?
aiModels.answer: The template currently supports Evolink (Sora 2, Wan 2.6, Veo 3.1, Seedance) and Kie.ai. The modular provider architecture makes it easy to add more AI providers. You can configure models and pricing in the config/pricing-user.ts file.

credits.question: How does the credit system work?
credits.answer: VideoMint uses a FIFO-based credit system with freeze/settle/release pattern. Users purchase credit packages or subscriptions, which are consumed when generating videos. The system supports credit expiration, refunds, and detailed transaction history.

customization.question: Can I customize the UI and branding?
customization.answer: Absolutely! The template is built with Tailwind CSS 4 and shadcn/ui components, making customization straightforward. All colors, fonts, and styling can be modified through the Tailwind configuration. The component structure is modular and well-documented.

payment.question: What payment providers are integrated?
payment.answer: VideoMint integrates with Creem as the primary payment provider, with Stripe available as a secondary option. Both support subscriptions and one-time purchases. The payment webhook system automatically handles credit allocation to user accounts.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to VideoMint. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI video generation service.

dataCollect.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollect.intro: We collect the following types of information:

items.account: Account Information: Name, email address, and profile information when you create an account
items.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our service, including prompts, generated videos, and interaction patterns
items.payment: Payment Information: Billing details processed through our payment providers (we do not store full payment card numbers)
items.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies
items.content: User Content: Text prompts and images you upload for video generation

items.service: Provide and improve our AI video generation services
items.account: Manage your account and process transactions
items.communication: Send you important updates about your account and service
items.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience and service quality
items.legal: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data with service providers who assist in operating our platform, payment processors for transaction handling, and law enforcement when required by law.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

items.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
items.portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent at any time where processing is based on consent

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. Generated videos and prompts may be retained for a limited period to comply with legal obligations.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for users under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the Last Updated date.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how VideoMint uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you use our service. This policy should be read together with our Privacy Policy.

whatAre.title: 2. What Are Cookies
whatAre.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website function properly and provide analytics to website owners. Similar technologies include web beacons, pixels, and local storage.

types.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
types.intro: We use the following categories of cookies:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for the operation of our service. They enable core functionality such as account authentication, security, and network management. These cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.content: Help us understand how visitors interact with our service by collecting anonymous information about page visits and error reports.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: Allow us to remember your preferences, such as language settings, theme choices, and customization options.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements. We do not use these for personalized advertising.

items.session: Session cookies to keep you logged in during your visit
items.auth: Authentication cookies to verify your account
items.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings
items.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand service usage

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages:

items.analytics: Analytics services (e.g., PostHog) for usage statistics
items.payment: Payment processors for secure transaction handling
items.auth: Authentication providers for social login features

items.browser: Your web browser settings to block or delete cookies
items.settings: Our cookie consent banner when you first visit

doNotTrack.title: 7. Do Not Track
doNotTrack.content: Currently, there is no industry standard for handling Do Not Track signals, so we do not respond to Do Not Track browser signals.

retention.title: 8. Cookie Retention
retention.content: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies remain on your device for the duration specified in the cookie (typically up to 12 months).

updates.title: 9. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business practices.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

Seedance.pageTitle: Seedance 1.5 Pro - AI Video Generation Model by ByteDance
Seedance.pageDescription: Seedance 1.5 Pro is ByteDance's next-generation AI video generation model. Create stunning videos from text, images, or keyframes with multiple generation modes.

overview.title: About Seedance 1.5 Pro
overview.description: Seedance 1.5 Pro is ByteDance's next-generation AI video generation model. Simply enter text descriptions or upload reference images to quickly generate high-quality video content. The model supports multiple generation modes including Text-to-Video, Image-to-Video, and Frame-to-Video to meet various creative needs.

textToVideo.title: Text-to-Video
textToVideo.description: Enter a text description and Seedance 1.5 Pro will generate corresponding video content based on your creative input. Supports detailed descriptions up to 2,500 characters for precise expression.

imageToVideo.title: Image-to-Video
imageToVideo.description: Upload a reference image as a starting point. The model generates dynamic video based on the image content and your text description. Supports JPEG, PNG, WEBP formats with single file max 10MB.

frameToVideo.title: Frame-to-Video
frameToVideo.description: Upload 2 images as the start and end points of your video. Seedance intelligently generates smooth transition video connecting the two keyframes. Perfect for state transitions, character changes, and natural scene flow.

promptTips.title: Prompt Writing Tips
promptTips.description: How to write effective prompts for better results

tips.title: Describe the Subject
tips.description: Clearly specify the main subject, including appearance features and expressions

tips.title: Environment & Background
tips.description: Describe the scene environment, lighting conditions, and atmosphere

tips.title: Motion Description
tips.description: Detail the subject's movement trajectory and speed

tips.title: Style Specification
tips.description: Indicate the desired visual style: realistic, cartoon, cinematic, etc.

tips.title: Camera Language
tips.description: Describe camera movements: push, pull, pan, dolly, etc.

examples.title: Example Prompts
examples.textToVideo: A fluffy orange cat lazily lying on a sunlit windowsill, squinting its eyes and yawning, tail gently swaying. Warm afternoon sunlight streams through the window, creating a cozy and comfortable atmosphere.

examples.frameToVideo: A flower gradually blooming from bud to full bloom, natural lighting changes with butterflies flying around.
